subject: Re: [junit] TestSuite - Order of test execution
msgSnippet: Hi John, ... No, TestNG is just a test harness, like JUnit. But I am very interested in JME testing since I write mobile code all day long. What is needed is a
messageBody:
Hi John,

On 9/19/05, John H. E. <johnemb@...> wrote:
>
> OK.
> Does TestNG support J2ME CDC (Connected Device Configuration)?


No, TestNG is just a test harness, like JUnit.

But I am very interested in JME testing since I write mobile code all day
long. What is needed is a JME testing harness that would let us drive an
emulator from Java (simulate keypresses, get the content of the screen,
etc...).

I have a few ideas on how to do this, but so far, I haven't had the time to
implement them.

How about you, how do you test your JME code right now?

--
Cedric


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
